name: Cozy House
description:
There's no such thing as a free lunch, but sometimes you can have a free house!

But as you get settled in this cozy little cabin you inherited from your grandmother, the more you get the feeling that maybe, just maybe, there's a price to be paid after all...

This game was created as part of the Seattle Indies Slow Jam 2021: https://itch.io/jam/seattle-indies-slow-jam-2021
